name: Grilled Tuna Steaks with Grape and Caper Salsa
author: Andrew Benoit
summary: This is a great summer dish to serve to family and friends. Make sure to rinse the capers well. Goes nicely with a light arugula salad.
ingredients: ⅓ cup capers, drained and rinsed
salt and black pepper to taste
directions: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil grate
Stir together grapes, capers, shallot, parsley, and olive oil in a bowl; season to taste with salt and pepper, and set aside
Place tuna steaks onto a plate, and brush with lemon juice
Season with salt and pepper to taste
Cook tuna steaks on preheated grill until cooked to desired degree of doneness, 2 to 3 minutes per side for medium-rare
Serve with the grape and caper salsa
